name: DeHub
public_notice: DeHub has migrated to v3. Please find more information here and here.

description.en: DeHub is blockchain's first entertainment aggregator and licensed producer of original motion picture, exclusive Pay-Per-View events, and surreal gaming experiences. This unified ecosystem is all fuelled with $DEHUB tokens through open-source software and secured by cutting-edge blockchain technology. Vote, fund, and earn in a variety of pioneering ways.
